game.name: Boys Cooking Challenge
game.description:
Who say that kitchen is also meant for the girls? Boys also love making dishes and surprise their guests with their unmatched cooking abilities. Today we have got you covered with a brand new girls game where two boys are ready to show off their skills in the kitchen. Both Jack and Kristoff have got participated in a leading cooking challenge and you are their only hope. Join Boys Cooking Challenge and be prepared to best cake and help your favorite prince to win in the end!

These handsome and skilled princes rely on your skills the most so do not make them disappoint and put your best knowledge about the cake preparation to create an awesome result. Go through all the ingredients shown on the screen to guide them show their best work in this HTML5 cooking game! Start it by choosing a colorful plate and give it the first cake layer while covering it in frosting! Do not forget to add some lovely decoration items around it like flowers on cherries or whipped cream.

Make sure to decorate it with some dripping topping and then use a special pen to prepare some awesome designs around it. You can also sprinkle some lefts, flowers or candy on top of it. Use some fireworks to make their cakes festive in this one of the best food games! Yellow roses, peacock feathers, or a butterfly will act as a wonderful and colorful centerpiece. Both the cakes are ready now. Decide which cake you like the most? Try out other popular free cake decoration games on atmegame.com and have fun without download!
